# Draft:Rayon (Software)

Rayon is a web-based CAD design tool for the architecture, engineering and construction industries.
It was founded in 2021 by Bastien Dolla and Stanislas Chaillou as a company based in Paris . It received funding from notable architect Norman Foster through (Foster + Partners). It is a Collaborative software, it allows multiple people to work on the same CAD document in real time.
The first web-based public beta version was launched in  September 2023.
Software
Rayon is used for: real estate, housing, space planning, or furniture manufacturing.
Rayon is an online software, the software is designed only for web use in PC web browsers or through their own local client. It offers some BIM software features.
Rayon key features are:
* Real-time collaborative CAD design
* Auto-dimensioning walls
* Importing DWG, DXF, PDF and PNG.
* Pre-made templates, assets and styles
* Cloud integration
* AI block creation from images
* Annotation, live chat and comments.
